AIX mksysb recovery notes

  1. If recovering to a new architecture/hardware locations using mksysb, do not recover devices during NIM recovery.
  2. Check timezone, date and time after the build process and set them as it used to be. 
     date
  3. Configure etherchannel
     smitty etherchannel
  4. Configure TCP/IP 
     smitty tcpip
  5. Check the hostname and set it as what it used to be. 
     hostname
  6. Configure AIO and set parameters as what it used to be (refer sysdoc) Check ioo for aix Version 6. 
     lsattr -El aio0
  7. Configure powerpath devices ( if any ) 
     powermt config
  8. Import non data Volume groups 
     importvg -y <vg_name> <diskname> or <pvid>
  9. Enable Powerpath for rootvg 
     pprootdev on
  10. Check and make sure the boot list is valid 
     bootlist -m normal -o
  11. Restart the system 
    shutdown -Fr
